beer.beer_name: Bombardier Amber Beer/Premium British Ale (Glorious English Ale)
beer.beer_description:
Bombardier Amber Beer is brewed using the finest British Hops and fresh mineral water from the Eagle Brewery Well. A fruity aroma and rich malty taste provides a crisp, mouth-watering beer. Tangy Fuggles hops and sultana fruit flavour finish off the palate. Bombardier is a beer for those who embrace their independent spirit and march to their own drum.

Previously known as Bombardier Glorious English Ale, now rebranded as Bombardier Amber Beer and also marketed as Bombardier Premium British Ale. 

UK ABVs: Cask 4.1%, Can 4.3%, Bottle 4.7%.
Export ABVs: Bottle 5.2%, Draught 5.5%.

items.badge_description: Thanks for staying at home, and checking in with Untappd! It allows us to stay connected to a community of beer lovers, just like you, even if we can't be in the same physical location. From our home to yours, cheers and stay safe!

Want to enjoy a day of brews, but need to keep your wits sharp? There are plenty of delicious brews under 5% for you to sip on throughout the day. That's 10 different beers with an ABV of 5% and lower. Try 5 more for Level 3!

There's beer in them thar hills! You're setting off on your journey through the world of beer, but be sure to take a little time to get to know each brewery as you go. That's a beer from 35 different breweries. Try 5 more for Level 8!

user.bio: Beer geek. Musician. Homebrewer @devilstailbrewing. Whisky and rum drinker. Traveler. Cat dad. Soulmate with @papercut84
